mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `pub_cityaddr` WHERE `pub_cityaddr`.`status` = 1

SELECT oocr.* FROM org_organ_company_ref oocr, org_user ou WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`Status` = 1 AND oocr.`Status` = 1 AND oocr.bindstate = 1 AND oocr.organid IN ( SELECT org.id FROM org_organ org WHERE org.creditcode = ( SELECT org2.creditcode FROM org_organ org2 WHERE org2. STATUS = 1 AND org2.id = ou.organid ) ) AND oocr.companyid = #{companyid} AND ou.id = #{userid}

SELECT psr.*, pca.city as citycaption FROM pub_sendrules psr, pub_cityaddr pca WHERE 1=1 AND psr.STATUS = 1 AND pca.STATUS = 1 AND pca.id = psr.city AND psr.rulesstate='0' AND psr.leasescompanyid=#{leasescompanyid} AND psr.vehicletype=#{vehicletype} AND psr.usetype=#{usetype} AND psr.city=#{city}

SELECT pd.*, pv.id vehicleid FROM pub_vehicle_scope pvs, pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr, pub_vehicle pv, pub_driver pd WHERE 1 = 1 AND pvs.`Status` = 1 AND pv.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.jobstatus = 0
AND pd.vehicletype = 0 AND pvs.vehicleid = pv.id AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id AND pdvr.vehicleId = pv.id
AND pd.identitytype = 1 AND pd.workstatus IN(${workstatuslist}) AND pvs.cityid = #{city} AND pd.id IN ( SELECT oudr.driverid FROM org_user_driver_ref oudr WHERE 1=1 AND oudr.`status` = 1 AND oudr.userid = #{userid} )
SELECT oo.* FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.orderno = #{orderno}

select org_order.orderno, org_order.ordertype, org_order.plateno, org_order.factmodelname cartype, concat(org_order.vehcbrandname, " ", org_order.vehclinename) carbrand, pub_driver.name drivername, pub_driver.phone driverphone, org_order.paymethod, org_order.usetype from org_order left join pub_driver on org_order.driverid = pub_driver.id where org_order.orderno = #{orderno}
SELECT * FROM `pub_dictionary` WHERE `pub_dictionary`.`status` = 1 AND type = '用车事由' AND type != value

select org_organ.id, org_organ.fullname, org_organ.shortname, org_organ.contacts, org_organ.cooperationstatus, org_organ.phone, org_organ.email, pub_cityaddr.city, org_organ.address, org_organ.billtype, org_organ.billdate, org_organ.creditcodepic, org_organ.creditcode, org_organ.businesslicensepic, org_organ.businesslicense, org_organ.idcardfront, org_organ.idcardback, org_organ.idcardno, org_organ.CreateTime, org_organ.UpdateTime, org_organ.Creater, org_organ.Updater, org_organ.status from org_organ left join pub_cityaddr on org_organ.city = pub_cityaddr.id left join le_company_rules_ref on org_organ.id = le_company_rules_ref.organid left join org_organ_company_ref on org_organ.id = org_organ_company_ref.organid where org_organ.status = 1 and le_company_rules_ref.status = 1 and le_company_rules_ref.rulestate = "1" and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and le_company_rules_ref.leasescompanyid = #{companyid} and org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{companyid} and org_organ_company_ref.bindstate = "1"

select org_organ.id, org_organ.fullname, org_organ.shortname, org_organ.contacts, org_organ.cooperationstatus, org_organ.phone, org_organ.email, pub_cityaddr.city, org_organ.address, org_organ.billtype, org_organ.billdate, org_organ.creditcodepic, org_organ.creditcode, org_organ.businesslicensepic, org_organ.businesslicense, org_organ.idcardfront, org_organ.idcardback, org_organ.idcardno, org_organ.createtime, org_organ.updatetime, org_organ.creater, org_organ.updater, org_organ.status from org_organ_company_ref left join org_organ on org_organ_company_ref.organid = org_organ.id left join pub_cityaddr on org_organ.city = pub_cityaddr.id where org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ_company_ref.companyid = #{companyid}

SELECT COUNT(aa.id) from (SELECT fav.*,CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone) namephone FROM ( ( SELECT ou.id, ou.id userid, ou.nickname `name`, ou.account phone, ou.createtime, ou.updatetime, ou.id creater, ou.id updater, ou.`Status` FROM org_user ou WHERE ou.`status` = 1 AND ou.id = #{userid} ) UNION ( SELECT om.* FROM pub_mostcontact om, org_user ou WHERE om.`status` = 1 AND ou.`status` = 1 AND om.userphone = ou.account AND om.phone != ou.account AND ou.id = #{userid} ) ) fav
WHERE (fav.phone like '%${sSearch}%' OR fav.name like '%${sSearch}%')
GROUP BY CONCAT(fav.name,fav.phone))aa

SELECT om.*,pca.city citycaption FROM pub_mostaddress om, pub_cityaddr pca WHERE 1=1 AND pca.`status` = 1 AND om.`status` = 1 AND pca.id = om.city AND om.userphone = #{userid} AND ( pca.city LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR om.address LIKE '%${sSearch}%' ) LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

SELECT
fav.name id, CONCAT(fav.phone, " ", IFNULL(fav.name,'')) text
fav.phone id, CONCAT(fav.phone, " ", IFNULL(fav.name,'')) text
FROM ( ( SELECT ou.id, ou.id userid, ou.nickname `name`, ou.account phone, ou.createtime, ou.updatetime, ou.id creater, ou.id updater, ou.`Status` FROM org_user ou WHERE ou.account = (select account from org_user where id = #{userid}) and ou.`Status` = 1 ) UNION ( SELECT om.* FROM pub_mostcontact om, org_user ou WHERE om.`status` = 1 AND om.userphone = ou.account AND ou.account = (select account from org_user where id = #{userid}) ) ) fav
WHERE (fav.phone LIKE '%${sSearch}%' OR fav.name LIKE '%${sSearch}%') group by CONCAT(fav.phone, ' ',IFNULL(fav.name,'')) LIMIT ${iDisplayStart},${iDisplayLength}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = ou.id AND oo.orderstatus = #{orderstatus} AND ( oo.paymentstatus = #{paymentstatus} OR ISNULL(oo.paymentstatus) ) ) > 0 notpay, ( SELECT COUNT(oo.orderno) FROM org_order oo WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.userid = ou.id AND oo.orderstatus IN (#{orderstatuslist}) ) notdone, ou.* FROM org_user ou WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`status` = 1 AND ou.id = #{userid}

select.if: SELECT la.startprice, la.rangeprice, la.timeprice, lv.* FROM le_accountrules la, le_vehiclemodels lv WHERE 1=1 AND lv.`Status` = 1 AND la.`Status` = 1 AND la.leasescompanyid = lv.leasescompanyid AND la.cartype = lv.Id AND la.type = 0 AND la.rulesstate = 0 AND la.rulestype = #{ordertype} AND la.leasescompanyid = #{companyid} AND la.city = #{city} and lv.modelstatus = "0" ORDER BY lv.`level`

SELECT la.startprice, la.rangeprice, la.timeprice, lv.* FROM le_vehiclemodels lv, le_accountrules la, le_company_rules_ref lcrr WHERE 1=1 AND lcrr.`Status` = 1 AND lv.`Status` = 1 and lv.modelstatus = "0" AND la.`Status` = 1 AND lcrr.rulestate = 1 AND la.type = 1 AND la.rulesstate = 0 AND la.cartype = lv.Id AND la.rulesrefid = lcrr.id AND lcrr.organid IN ( SELECT org.id FROM org_organ org, org_user ou WHERE org.creditcode = ( SELECT org2.creditcode FROM org_organ org2 WHERE org2. STATUS = 1 AND org2.id = ou.organid AND ou.id = #{userid} ) ) AND lcrr.leasescompanyid = #{companyid} AND la.city = #{city} AND la.rulestype = #{ordertype} AND lv.Id IN ( SELECT oucr.vehiclemodels FROM org_user ou, org_usecarrules oucr, org_user_rules_ref ourr WHERE 1=1 AND ou.`Status` = 1 AND oucr.`status` = 1 AND ourr.`status` = 1 AND ourr.userid = ou.id AND ourr.userulesid = oucr.id AND oucr.usetype = #{ordertype} AND ou.id = #{userid} ) ORDER BY lv.`level`

mapper.update: UPDATE org_order oo SET oo.pushnumber = #{pushcount} WHERE oo.`status` = 1 AND oo.orderno = #{orderno}

select * from ( select concat(d.id, '_', v.id) id, concat(d.phone, ' ', d.`name`) text, d.jobnum jobNum, d.`name`, d.phone, d.workstatus workStatus, concat(dicp.`text`, dicc.`text`, v.plateno) plateNo, vm.name vehicleModelName, dicb.text belongleasecompany, dicb.id belongleasecompanyId from pub_driver d inner join pub_driver_vehicle_ref vr on d.id=vr.driverid inner join pub_vehicle v on v.id=vr.vehicleid inner join le_vehcline_models_ref vmr on vmr.vehclineid=v.vehclineid inner join le_vehiclemodels vm on vm.id=vmr.vehiclemodelsid inner join pub_dictionary dicp on v.platenoprovince=dicp.value inner join pub_dictionary dicc on v.platenocity=dicc.value inner join pub_dictionary dicb on dicb.id=d.belongleasecompany where 1=1 and d.Status=1 and vr.status=1 and v.Status=1 and vmr.Status=1 and vm.Status=1 and dicp.status=1 and dicc.status=1 and d.workstatus=0 and d.jobstatus=0 and dicb.type = '租赁公司' and dicb.status='1' and d.leasescompanyid=#{leasesCompanyId}
and instr(d.phone, #{phone}) > 0
and instr(d.jobnum, #{jobNum}) > 0
and instr(d.`name`, #{name}) > 0
and (instr(d.`name`, #{keyword}) > 0 or instr(d.phone, #{keyword}) > 0)
) t where 1=1
and instr(t.plateNo, #{plateNo}) > 0
select * from le_leasescompany where le_leasescompany.platformtype='1' and le_leasescompany.status=1 ORDER BY createtime LIMIT 0,1

SELECT id as id, fullname as name FROM org_organ WHERE org_organ.status = 1 AND org_organ.customertype = '0' AND org_organ.id in ( SELECT org_organ_company_ref.organid FROM org_organ_company_ref WHERE org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 AND ( org_organ_company_ref.mainaccount = '0' OR org_organ_company_ref.bindstate = '1' ) AND org_organ_company_ref.companyid in ( #{companyid} ) )

SELECT id as id, account as phone, org_user.nickname as name FROM org_user WHERE org_user.status = 1 AND org_user.usertype = '0' AND org_user.organid in ( SELECT organ.id FROM org_organ organ WHERE organ.status = 1 AND organ.creditcode = ( SELECT org_organ.creditcode FROM org_organ WHERE org_organ.status = 1 AND org_organ.id = #{organid} ) AND organ.customertype != 1 ) ORDER BY createtime desc
